document_data.caption: Randall in Eveningstar.
document_data.name: Randall Lyric
document_data.mainbody: '''Randall Lyric''' was an [[aasimar]] [[planeswalker]] who dealt in magical [[gemstone]]s across many worlds during [[Faer√ªn]]'s late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: Randall was a tall ivory-skinned aasimar man with pupilless eyes and a glowing mark on his forehead. He wore a brown leather [[trenchcoat]] and a wide-brimmed [[hat]], both of strange design unseen on [[Toril]].
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, Randall Lyric followed a group of adventurers from the world of [[Eberron]] to the village of [[Eveningstar]] on Toril during their quest to investigate the nearby ruins of the [[Haunted Halls]], and to the [[Ball and Chain]] tavern outside of the [[Wheloon Prison]]. He followed the adventurers to other worlds, including to [[Saltmarsh]] on the world of [[Oerth]], [[Sharn (Eberron)|Sharn]] of Eberron, the [[Feywild]], [[Barovia]] in the [[Domains of Dread]], and the legendary planar-traveling [[Isle of Dread]].
